articles.title: Greetings to President of Kenya
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Kenya
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Mwai Kibaki, president of Kenya, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president of Kenya success in his responsible work.
